## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                     | Type                   | Default                   |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ------------------------- |
| `columns`  | `columns`  | Number of columns                               | `number`               | `4`                       |
| `featured` | `featured` | Number of featured images                       | `number`               | `2`                       |
| `folder`   | --         | Folder from which to take the files to display. | `{ children: any[]; }` | `{     children: [],   }` |
